TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UIElement3DAutomationPeer extends System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer

summary.span: 向 UI 自动化公开 类型。

span.span: Exposes types to UI Automation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，任何类，它继承自使用与通信[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。By default, any class that inherits from uses to communicate with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]. 如果你创建一个继承自的类，你可能想要提供自动化对等方以支持你的类的功能。If you create a class that inherits from , you may want to provide an automation peer to support the functionality of your class. 重写方法以返回一个字符串，表示与关联的元素的类型。Override the method to return a string that represents the type of the element associated with the . 例如，如果你创建一个名为类`My3DElement`和自动化对等方调用`My3DElementAutomationPeer`，重写方法以返回字符串"My3DElement"。For example, if you create a class called `My3DElement` and an automation peer called `My3DElementAutomationPeer`, override the method to return the string "My3DElement". 如果你的类与已知的控件类型之一相匹配，重写方法可以返回该。If your class matches one of the known control types, override the method to return that . 请注意，虽然现有通常与二维控件相关的有效值指示控件的功能，不是其外观。Note that although the existing values are generally associated with 2D controls, the indicates a control's functionality, not its appearance. 因此，如果你调用操作，当用户单击它，你可能希望返回。So if your invokes an action when the user clicks it, you probably want to return . 您的自定义的行为确定应重写其他方法。The behavior of your custom determines what other methods you should override. 中的每个方法主题介绍如何使用方法以及何时适合可以重写它。Each method topic in the describes how the method is used and when it is appropriate to override it. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法如果你不是内容元素。Override the method if your is not a content element. 内容元素包含向用户显示的数据。A content element contains data that is presented to the user. 内容的一个示例是元素的在列表框或按钮出现在对话框中的项。An example of a content element is an item in a list box or a button on a dialog box. 通常使用非内容元素，也称为外围元素，来操作复合控件中的内容。You typically use non-content elements, which are also called peripheral elements, to manipulate the content in a composite control. 非内容元素的一个示例是下拉列表控件上的按钮。An example of a non-content element is the button on a drop-down control. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不指示元素是否可见。This property does not indicate whether the element is visible. 在某些情况下，元素将显示在屏幕上，但却仍不可见。In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible. 例如，如果该元素已在其他元素遮盖但屏幕上，则它可能不可见。For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible. 在这种情况下该方法返回`false`。In this case the method returns `false`. 继承自的类通常不需要重写。Classes that inherit from typically do not need to override . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
